languages.text: {n}Те из сципионцев, что все же успели проскочить в ульи и затаиться там, затаили крепкую обиду на Вольного Торговца, обрекш{mf|его|ую} на смерть их родню и соседей. Они поклялись не забыть своих мертвецов.{/n}

{n}Those Scipions who had managed to sneak into and hide in the hives harbour a strong resentment against the Rogue Trader who condemned their relatives and neighbours to death. They vowed not to forget their dead.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Те из сципионцев, что все же успели проскочить в ульи и затаиться там, затаили крепкую обиду на Вольного Торговца, обрекш{mf|его|ую} на смерть их родню и соседей. Они поклялись не забыть своих мертвецов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Those Scipions who had managed to sneak into the hives and hide there, harboured a strong resentment against the Rogue Trader who condemned their relatives and neighbours to death. They vowed not to forget their dead.{/n}

{n}Those Scipions who had managed to sneak into the hives and hide there, harboured a strong resentment against the Rogue Trader who condemned their relatives and neighbours to death. They vowed not to forget their dead.{/n}

{n}Those Scipions who had managed to sneak into and hide in the hives harbour a strong resentment against the Rogue Trader who condemned their relatives and neighbours to death. They vowed not to forget their dead.{/n}

{n}Those Scipions who had managed to sneak into and hide in the hives harbour a strong resentment against the Rogue Trader who condemned their relatives and neighbours to death. They vowed not to forget their dead.{/n}

{n}Those Scipions who had managed to sneak into and hide in the hives harbour a strong resentment against the Rogue Trader who condemned their relatives and neighbours to death. They vowed not to forget their dead.{/n}

languages.text: {n}许多希皮奥内人想办法溜进了巢都，混迹于当地民众之间。这群人对行商浪人抱着强烈的仇恨，因为行商浪人下令把他们的亲友丢在废土里等死。那些幸存者发誓，绝对不会忘记那些惨死的人们。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those Scipions who had managed to sneak into and hide in the hives harbour a strong resentment against the Rogue Trader who condemned their relatives and neighbours to death. They vowed not to forget their dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}许多希皮奥内人想办法溜进了巢都，混迹于当地民众之间。这群人对行商浪人抱着强烈的仇恨，因为行商浪人下令把他们的亲友丢在废土里等死。那些幸存者发誓，绝对不会忘记那些惨死的人们。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los Escipiones que habían conseguido colarse y esconderse en las colmenas guardan un fuerte resentimiento contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente que condenó a muerte a sus familiares y vecinos. Juraron no olvidar a sus muertos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those Scipions who had managed to sneak into and hide in the hives harbour a strong resentment against the Rogue Trader who condemned their relatives and neighbours to death. They vowed not to forget their dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los Escipiones que habían conseguido colarse y esconderse en las colmenas guardan un fuerte resentimiento contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente que condenó a muerte a sus familiares y vecinos. Juraron no olvidar a sus muertos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハイヴに忍び込んで身を隠していたサイピオーネの住人たちは、自分たちの親族や知り合いを死に追いやったローグトレーダーに対して強い恨みを抱いている。彼らは死者を忘れないと誓った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those Scipions who had managed to sneak into and hide in the hives harbour a strong resentment against the Rogue Trader who condemned their relatives and neighbours to death. They vowed not to forget their dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハイヴに忍び込んで身を隠していたサイピオーネの住人たちは、自分たちの親族や知り合いを死に追いやったローグトレーダーに対して強い恨みを抱いている。彼らは死者を忘れないと誓った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les Scipioniens ayant réussi à infiltrer les ruches pour s'y cacher en ont énormément voulu {mf|au|à la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}, qui avait condamné à mort leurs proches et leurs voisins. Ils ont donc juré de ne jamais oublier leurs défunts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those Scipions who had managed to sneak into and hide in the hives harbour a strong resentment against the Rogue Trader who condemned their relatives and neighbours to death. They vowed not to forget their dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les Scipioniens ayant réussi à infiltrer les ruches pour s'y cacher en ont énormément voulu {mf|au|à la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}, qui avait condamné à mort leurs proches et leurs voisins. Ils ont donc juré de ne jamais oublier leurs défunts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Scipionen, denen es gelungen war, sich in eine Makropole zu schleichen und sich dort zu verstecken, hegen einen tiefen Groll gegen {mf|den Freihändler, der|die Freihändlerin, die} ihre Verwandten und Nachbarn zum Tode verurteilt hatte. Sie schworen, ihre Toten nie zu vergessen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Those Scipions who had managed to sneak into and hide in the hives harbour a strong resentment against the Rogue Trader who condemned their relatives and neighbours to death. They vowed not to forget their dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Scipionen, denen es gelungen war, sich in eine Makropole zu schleichen und sich dort zu verstecken, hegen einen tiefen Groll gegen {mf|den Freihändler, der|die Freihändlerin, die} ihre Verwandten und Nachbarn zum Tode verurteilt hatte. Sie schworen, ihre Toten nie zu vergessen.{/n}
